title: Cohomology of diagram algebras
abstract:
The study of the homology of diagram algebras has emerged as an interesting
and important field. In many cases, the homology of a diagram algebra can be
identified with the homology of a group. In this paper we have two main aims.
Firstly, we study the (co)homology of new families of diagram algebras such as
the blob algebras and the walled Brauer algebras, both of which exhibit new
phenomena in the field. Secondly, we show that in the cases where the homology
of a diagram algebra can be identified with group homology one can also
identify the cohomology of the algebra with the cohomology of a group. We use
this to establish an integer-graded cohomology theory for these diagram
algebras and identify this with the Tate cohomology of a group.
